data.prayer: Father, see the suffering of your people in the county of Haibei Tibetan. Deliver all those who have not forgotten your Word.
data.verse: Look on my suffering and deliver me, for I have not forgotten your law.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Haibei Tibetan, Qinghai, China
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the county of Haibei Tibetan to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.section_summary: On average, 31 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in Haibei Tibetan, Qinghai, China.
data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to these new families.
Lord, give grace to the local leaders who shepherd the 18,540 believers in the county of Haibei Tibetan.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.

data.prayer: Father, guide the church in Haibei Tibetan, Qinghai, China to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Yugur, Enger people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Yugur, Enger people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Yugur, Enger people is yours.
Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the county of Haibei Tibetan
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.prayer: Father, encourage your church in Haibei Tibetan that you never forsake them.
data.verse: Those who know your name will put their trust in you, for you, Yahweh, have not forsaken those who seek you.

data.section_summary:
the county of Haibei Tibetan, Qinghai, China has a population of 244,400.

We estimate Haibei Tibetan has 18,540 people who might know Jesus, 3,948 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 221,911 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, bring yourself glory in Haibei Tibetan. Through your servants plant 48 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.
